thread.title_full: Ryadon Inc. Team Announces Continuation of their Quantity Discount Program for Loyal Consumers

author: Sales & Service
title: Ryadon Inc. Team Announces Continuation of their Quantity Discount Program for Loyal Consumers
text:
Ryadon Inc. is immediately continuing their quantity discount program for loyal consumers. As a leading manufacturer and distributor or 250 lb drawer slides ( http://drawerslidesinc.com/texas/ ), this discount program has proven to be very successful. Ryadon, Inc. manufactures custom products including a wide range of drawer slides which are made of the best materials and lasting consumers decades. The quantity discount program offers 10% off for orders from 4 to 19 and a whopping 20% off of orders of 20 or more pieces. These are tremendous savings in the world of drawer slides.
Ryadon Inc. provides solutions for businesses. The 250 lb drawer slides ( http://drawerslidesinc.com/drawer-slides/product/250-lb-full-extension-drawer-slide/ ) provide a safe working environment as they will last owners years. Best of all, they are maintenance free, reducing any upkeep costs. There is no doubt that Ryadon Inc. Offers the best drawer slides and hardware in the industry.
Customers are welcome to take advantage of this discount and more directly from Ryadonâ€™s website: http://www.ryadon.com .
About Ryadon Inc.
Ryadon Inc. is a leader among industrial hardware companies. With an extensive collection of products, Ryadon not only supplies the best 250 lb drawer slides ( http://drawerslidesinc.com/ ), but also a wide collection of vents, latches, slides and handles as well as office furniture and other related items for vehicles and fabricated enclosure industries. In a competitive market, Ryadon never sacrifices quality or business integrity and is still able to provide customers with high quality and cost effective prices, the best in the industry.
Order 4-19: Receive 10% discount - Order 20+: Receive 20% discount
HEAVY DUTY DRAWER SLIDES
250 lb. full extension drawer slide .75(19mm) x 2.09(53mm), lever disconnect, 1" over travel, 10-36 inch lengths.
500 lb. Full extension drawer slide .75(19mm) x 3.00(76mm) 8- 60 inch lengths.
500 lb. full extension drawer slide lock in lock out .75(19mm) x 3.00(76mm), 12-60 inch lengths.
Quantity Discounts
Order 4-19: Receive 10% discount
Order 20+: Receive 20% discount
Future plans include to further develop new and innovated drawer slide products and reach new markets with our extensive line and capabilities
Ryadon, Inc. has been serving our industrial hardware customers since 1987. Please contact a sales representative at sales (at) ryadon.com for 250 lb drawer slides OEM pricing or bulk quantities.
Whether you are a weekend warrior building a toolbox or an OEM manufacturer doing mass production we are here to supply quality product at prices to fit your needs.
Tel. (949) 768-8333
Website. http://drawerslidesinc.com/
